DICE Firmware Compiled on 8 Oct 2009

DICE Firmware Source Code

This documentation was compiled from document tags in the firmware source code. The major and minor version numbers are defined in the version .c source file. The version number is also shown in the CLI splash screen.

If you make changes in your code that you wish to document, add the appropriate doxygen tags and recompile this documentation.

Recompile using 

 /firmware/project/myProject/make/make doxygen

The resulting HTML documentation start page is 
 /firmware/project/myProject/doxygen/GeneratedDocumentation/html/index.html


If you download and install the HTML Help Workshop this HTML will automatically be compiled into a Windows Help (CHM) file.

The resulting file will be 

 /firmware/project/myProject/doxygen/GeneratedDocumentation/help/SDKUserCompiledHelp.chm


If you install the HTML Help Workshop in a directory other than the default 

 C:\Program Files\HTML Help Workshop

then edit 
 /firmware/project/myProject/doxygen/doxyfile

and modify the HHC_LOCATION path to your installation accordingly.
